messages.subject: Re: Seinan/Satsuma War pics+drawings+French Police
messages.msgSnippet: oops forgot to mention the password you ll need to access the folder = makoto
messages.messageBody:
oops forgot to mention the password you'll need to access the folder =
"makoto"

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "secretary" <secretarytocapt3@h...> wrote:
> Visit:
> http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3
> file name: Seinan+TMPD+FrenchPolice
> there are 4 files (all pdf with citations) from 4 different books
> once you open the folder you will see
> All 4 files=9.81 mb (but worth it trust me)
>
> Frpolice.pdf=photos of what Toshiyoshi Kawaji saw in France during
> his brief but significant visit (the gov. had already decided to
> adopt the French model for the police...the visit was merely a
> formality)
>
> seinancollection1.pdf=drawings and photos (one photo seems to be
> taken right after the war...excellent stuff here
>
> seinancollection2.pdf=photo of Toshiyoshi Kawaji we've never seen
> before and a photo of Imperial Army camp (I think)
>
> seinancollection3.pdf=photos of all the important people and I
> inserted a yellow note under a photo of a man named TANI...who
> played a critical role at the seige of Kumamoto castle/garrison

messages.subject: Seinan/Satsuma War pics+drawings+French Police
messages.msgSnippet: Visit: http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3 file name: Seinan+TMPD+FrenchPolice there are 4 files (all pdf with citations) from 4 different books once
messages.messageBody:
Visit:
http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3
file name: Seinan+TMPD+FrenchPolice
there are 4 files (all pdf with citations) from 4 different books
once you open the folder you will see
All 4 files=9.81 mb (but worth it trust me)

Frpolice.pdf=photos of what Toshiyoshi Kawaji saw in France during
his brief but significant visit (the gov. had already decided to
adopt the French model for the police...the visit was merely a
formality)

seinancollection1.pdf=drawings and photos (one photo seems to be
taken right after the war...excellent stuff here

seinancollection2.pdf=photo of Toshiyoshi Kawaji we've never seen
before and a photo of Imperial Army camp (I think)

seinancollection3.pdf=photos of all the important people and I
inserted a yellow note under a photo of a man named TANI...who
played a critical role at the seige of Kumamoto castle/garrison
